videos.description: Virginia's Ty Jerome bounces it through the paint to find Jack Salt who two-hand dunks it.
videos.headline: Jerome feeds Salt for throw down

videos.description: BC's Jerome Robinson finishes his drive with a 3-point play.
videos.headline: Robinson lays it in for the and-1

videos.description: Ty Jerome tops off Virginia's 9-point streak with another 3.
videos.headline: Jerome sinks 3-pointer from the corner

videos.description: Virginia's Kyle Guy misses the layup but Isaiah Wilkins slams it home off the rebound.
videos.headline: Wilkins puts back slam

videos.description: Ty Jerome, Virginia's leading scorer on the day, adds to his career high point total with a 3-point play.
videos.headline: Jerome continues to light up the paint

videos.description: BC's Jerome Robinson pulls up for a step-back 3-pointer to tie Virginia with five minutes left.
videos.headline: Robinson's step-back 3 ties game

videos.description: Ty Jerome hits another 3-pointer from deep for Virginia.
videos.headline: Jerome soars from 3-point line
